description:
Modern heritage style. Backed by over 50 years of Scandinavian outdoor expertise, the Sten was made for easygoing walking, hiking or cycling day trips, but it looks just as good on neighbourhood wanders or jaunts to the local farmers' market. A highly durable cotton and polyester blend is waxed to block out wind and shed light rain.

  • Made from a super-durable blend of polyester and cotton with a dense weave that protects you from UV
  • Impregnated with Fjallraven's Greenland wax treatment for excellent water resistance. To make it waterproof, apply additional wax (sold separately)
  • Zippered chest pocket and hand pockets hold all your stuff
  • Button cuffs and drawstring hem
name: Fjallraven Sten Jacket - Men's
